comments.body: Reminder to @kubernetes/kubectl @kubernetes/rh-ux to review the flag name.  This is a global flag which controls whether or not the client will attempt to find third-party resource registrations on a given server.  Be happy with it because once we ship it in 1.2, that's the name.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@
.PP
\fB\-\-include\-extended\-apis\fP=true
    If true, include definitions of new APIs via calls to the API server. [default true]
